actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize special agents of the Department of State to make arrests during the investigation of passport and visa law violations and to carry firearms.

summary.text: Authorizes special agents of the Department of State to serve warrants and subpenas to enforce passport and visa laws and to make arrests for violations of such laws committed in their presence. Authorizes such special agents to carry firearms.

titles.title: A bill to authorize special agents of the Department of State to make arrests during the investigation of passport and visa law violations and to carry firearms.
